content: | Welcome to LUMS Skip to main content ApplyAdmissionsFinancial AidDonateCampus HealthNewsEventsContact Faculty Directory LUMS faculty comprises recognised experts across a variety of disciplines who are driven by a shared purpose: to make a better world through scholarship, research and teaching. Our 200+ PhD holding faculty members are leaders in their respective fields, and work collaboratively with each other and students to develop innovative solutions to 21st century challenges.
